p: Our study indicates that all grapefruit essential oils can be used as anti-inflammatory agents, with Rose grapefruit showing the highest potential, followed by Marsh and, lastly, Star Ruby, in both peels and leaves. This could be linked to the known antioxidant potential of the fruit. The presence of Vitamin C, B, A and lycopene in grapefruits has been reported to help fight inflammation caused by free-radical damage in the body [ 21].
